newsitem.title: FRANCE: Bouzet touts M6, Jet Multimedia as outperformers.
newsitem.headline: Bouzet touts M6, Jet Multimedia as outperformers.

text.p: French brokerage Bouzet (BNP Equities) released a research report on Thursday concluding that communications firms M6, Jet Multimedia and Le Grand Livre du Mois would outperform their respective indices by more than 10 percent in coming months.

In the report, analyst Walter Vejdovsky said he was touting M6 because its turnover was growing at a faster rate than the television advertising market and because the channel financed its own development.
The analyst recommended Jet Multimedia because it had launched France Explorer Internet software, which he said had 20,000 users after two months.
He recommended Le Grand Livre du Mois due to its 1996 turnover of 770 millions francs, although he added there was little liquidity in the market for its shares.
